DOC.brief_summary: Previous study conclude striae gravidarum assessment appear predict occurrence perineal tear recommend train health personnel calculate total stria score help decide episiotomy give . Episiotomy definitely seem preventive perineal tear give episiotomy still debatable episiotomy associate morbidity . hypothesis episiotomy do patient high score definitely protect perineal tear . So , aim study determine whether assessment stria gravidarum score could predict occurrence tear labor , episiotomy prevent perineal tear woman high score .
DOC.brief_title: Prediction Perineal Tears Striae Gravidarum Score
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Multipara 2 . Singleton pregnancy 3 . Fullterm ( 37 41 week ) 4 . Average size fetus ( 25004000 gm ) 5 . Cephalicvertex presentation 6 . Spontaneous onset labor 7 . No scarred uterus 8 . No medical disease hypertension 9 . No obstetric complication obstruct labor 10 . Women accept participate study Exclusion criterion : 1 . Multiple pregnancy 2 . Women Previous cesarean section 3 . Preterm labor 4 . Malpresentation 5 . Fetal macrosomia 6 . Medical disease diabetes hypertension 7 . Women refuse participate study
